title: What Lives in This Hole?
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 368 words, Level K (Grade 2), Lexile 530L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     H and N
description: From the deserts of Arizona to the streams and rivers of Japan, people have wondered What Lives in This Hole? Join the student author as he writes a class blog about burrowing animals from all over the world. Interesting photos and detailed maps give readers the opportunity to learn about animals they many never see above the ground. The book and lesson are also available at Levels H and N.
meta: blog, claws, naked mole rats, puffins, salamander, tunnels, webbed feet, wombat
Ask and answer questions to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Exclamation Marks : Recognize and use exclamation marks
Suffixes : Identify and understand the use of suffix -ing

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
